header_text: Your spouse has decided to go back to school at a prestigious program in another state. You love your spouse very much, but you know that long distance relationships can be difficult.

elements.text: When you picture the future of your relationship with your spouse you do not think the distance will end your relationship, and you believe the two of you will stay...

elements.name: Your spouse has decided to go back to school at a prestigious program in another state. You love your spouse very much, but you know that long distance relationships can be difficult. _Romantic Relationships_entry2
